name: block-track
description: A basic supply chain management system

scripts.init: composer network install --card PeerAdmin@hlfv1 --archiveFile block-track@0.0.1.bna && composer network start --networkName block-track --networkVersion 0.0.1 --networkAdmin admin --networkAdminEnrollSecret adminpw --card PeerAdmin@hlfv1 --file networkadmin.card
scripts.start: composer-rest-server -c admin@block-track -n never -u true -d n -w true

author: Polly Ho
